import React from "react"; import "./how_it_works.css"; const HowItWorks = () => { return (

Fitness Logger

About us

How It Works

Welcome to the Logger App! Follow these simple steps to get started with tracking your nutrition, goals, and workouts.

1. Sign Up

Create an account by providing your email and password on the Sign-Up page. Once done, youâ€™ll be ready to log in!

2. Log In

Use your credentials to log in and access the app's features.

3. Set Your Goals

Head to the "Goals" section under the Main page to define your fitness and nutrition objectives.

4. Log Your Activities

Use the "Workout Log" and "Nutrition" sections to track your daily workouts and meals.

5. Update Your Profile

Personalize your experience by updating your profile with your stats and preferences.

6. Monitor Your Progress

Regularly check your progress and adjust your goals as needed.

); }; export default HowItWorks;
